com.revature.repositories

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Integer>

    @Repository
public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Integer>
    UserRepository which extends the JpaRepository. This repository handles our various queries.
    Author:
    Adonis Cabreja

    • Method Detail

      • getUserByRole

        @Query(value="select u from User u where u.isDriver = ?1")
List<User> getUserByRole(boolean isDriver)
        Custom query that uses the @Query annotation to select a user by isDriver.
        Parameters:
        isDriver - represents if a user is a driver or rider.
        Returns:
        Check UserServiceImpl

      • getUserByUsername

        @Query(value="select u from User u where u.userName = ?1")
List<User> getUserByUsername(String username)
        Custom query that uses the @Query annotation to select a user by username.
        Parameters:
        username - represents the user's username.
        Returns:
        Check UserServiceImpl

      • getUserByRoleAndLocation

        @Query(value="select u from User u where u.isDriver = ?1 and u.batch.batchLocation = ?2")
List<User> getUserByRoleAndLocation(boolean isDriver,
                                                                                                                               String location)
        Custom query that uses the @Query annotation to select a user by isDriver and location.
        Parameters:
        isDriver - represents if a user is a driver or rider.
        location - represents the batch's location.
        Returns:
        Check UserServiceImpl

      • getActiveDrivers

        @Query(value="select u from User u where u.isDriver = true and u.isActive = true and u.isAcceptingRides = true")
